description: This file defines a Java data transfer object (DTO) class named AccountResponse used for transferring account-related data in the internet banking microservices system.

classes.name: AccountResponse
classes.description: A DTO class representing account response data, including account number, balances, ID, type, and status.

methods.name: getter/setter methods generated by Lombok @Data annotation
methods.description: Automatic getter and setter methods for all fields, generated by Lombok.
